I had the same problem (The file " d3dx9_27.dll" was not found) when I first started playing it. Was about to try and install it from a DX9 Feb 2006 update (I'm on DX11) when I decided to try the game executable in the folder rather than using the one in "CivCity Rome.7z" in the archive. The game now runs OK on my system: Windows 7 x64.

Thannks man!
